1:
Yahweh, when you are angry with me,\q2 do not rebuke me and punish me!
\q1
2:
Now it is as though you have shot your arrows at me and wounded me;\q2 it is as though you have struck me and knocked me down.


\q1
3:
Because you have been angry with me,\q2 I am suffering great pain.
\q1 Because of my sin,
\q2 my whole body is diseased.
\q1
4:
All my sins are like a flood that covers my head;\q2 they are like a load that is very heavy; I cannot carry them.



\q1
5:
Because I have done foolish things,\q2 I have sores that have become worse, and they stink.
\q1
6:
Sometimes I am bent over, and sometimes I lie prostrate;\q2 I mourn all day.


\q1
7:
My body is burning with fever,\q2 and I am very ill.
\q1
8:
I am completely exhausted, and I have no strength.\q2 I am very distressed in my inner being, and I groan with pain.



\q1
9:
Yahweh, you know that I desire you to heal me;\q2 you hear me while I am groaning.
\q1
10:
My heart pounds heavily, and all my strength is gone.\q2 I am no longer able to see well.


\q1
11:
My friends and neighbors stay away from me because of my sores;\q2 even my own family stays far from me.
\q1
13:
Now I act like a deaf man and do not listen to what they say.\q2 I act like a man who cannot talk, and I say nothing to reply to them.
\q1
14:
I act like a man who does not answer when people talk to him\q2 because he cannot hear anything.


\q1
15:
But Yahweh, I trust in you.\q2 My Lord God, you will answer me.
\q1
16:
I said to you, "Do not cause me to die so that my enemies will rejoice!\q2 If troubles overwhelm me, my enemies will do very bad things to me!"



\q1
17:
I say that because I am about to fall down,\q2 and I constantly have pain.
\q1
18:
I confess the wrong things that I have done;\q2 I am very sorry for the sins that I have committed.


\q1
19:
My enemies are healthy and strong;\q2 there are many people who hate me for no reason.
\q1
20:
Those who do evil things to me in return for my doing good things to them\q2 oppose me because I try to do what is right.



\q1
21:
Yahweh, do not abandon me!\q2 My God, do not stay far from me!
\q1
22: Lord, you are the one who saves me;\q2 Quickly come and help me!
